Posts.Content: Oct 13, 2011 07:01PM PHXBethS wrote: Hi All, I'm starting my first chemo treatment on 10/21.  My cocktail will be Taxotere, Carboplatin and Herceptin.  I had right breast nipple sparing mastectomy on 9/21.  I have a tissue expander and will see the plastic surgeon for my first expansion tomorrow.  (10/14).  This is a recurrence for me as I was treated for DCIS in 1999/2000.  I'm anxious to get started with chemo - but only so I can be closer to finished! Madpeacock, you've been able to keep up running?  I haven't been released to exercise post-surgery yet but hoping to get back at it soon!
Posts.Title: October 2011 Chemo group stjude10 cfdr
